result.items:
<#if items??>
	<#list items as status>
	
		${status.phoneId!""}
		${status.servId!""}
		${status.brand!""}
		${status.planId!""}
		${status.userSts!""}
		${status.operSts!""}
		${status.acctSts!""}
		${status.mgntSts!""}
		${status.validDate?string("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")!""}
		${status.expireDate?string("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")!""}
		${status.beginDate?string("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")!""}
	
	</#list>
	</#if>
